attributes.action: Increase £10 Christmas Bonus, and the £0.25 80+ Age Addition for State Pension.
attributes.additional_details:
Increase the state benefit £10 Christmas Bonus, paid to most claimants, and the £0.25 80+ Age Addition for State Pension. 
Please increase them both in line with the amount each would have been if it had increased each year and kept up with inflation.  And then link their annual increases to the percentage that State Pension increases each year with the annual uprating which would maintain the rate across all benefit customers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same action:  

Abolish the basic State Pension, increase the new State Pension and pay to all. - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700122

Increase the DWP Christmas bonus for benefit claimants to £20 - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701138
